means: 简练的，精辟的，简洁扼要的

sentence.Network_en: His pithy advice to young painters was, "Above all, keep your colours fresh."
sentence.Network_cn: 他对年轻画家言简意赅的建议是，“首要的一点，保持色彩鲜艳。”

sentence.Network_en: Many of them made a point of praising the film's pithy dialogue.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们中很多人特别赞扬了影片精炼的对白。

sentence.Network_en: Their discourse, witty, pithy, original, had such charms for me.
sentence.Network_cn: 她们的谈话又机智, 又精辟, 又有独特见解, 对我有很大魅力.

The twigs are terete and pithy rather than woody ., 树枝是穹窿和简练 , 而不是木本.

list.abs: a pithy saying that expresses a general truth or fundamental principle ; an aphorism .警句，格言简练的格言，表达普遍的真谛或基本原则；警语，格言。
pithy 有髓的pithy core 松软的果心pitocin （垂体）后叶催产素
背口诀记字根,reciting the... ... ) the ten-character pithy formula 十字口诀 ) pithy formula 口诀 ) a pithy formula 口诀.
Malaysian palm whose pithy trunk yields sago -- a starch as a food thickener and fabric stiffener ; Malaya to Fiji .产于马来西亚的棕榈，其木髓树干出产西谷米——一种用作食物的质地变硬、变粗的淀粉；产于马来亚到斐济地区。

entry.tran: 简洁扼要的；言简意赅的
entry.def: A pithy comment or piece of writing is short, direct, and full of meaning.

example.ex: His pithy advice to young painters was, 'Above all, keep your colours fresh.'...
example.tran: 他对年轻画家言简意赅的建议是，“首要的一点，保持色彩鲜艳。”

example.ex: Many of them made a point of praising the film's pithy dialogue.
example.tran: 他们中很多人特别赞扬了影片精炼的对白。

sentences.sentence: "the peculiarly sardonic and sententious style in which Don Luis composed his epigrams"- Hervey Allen
